name: Paintball Dodge Challenge PvP
description:
The arena challenge is about to get bigger and better! We are back to fulfill the only wish of paintball players, to make is multiplayer!!
play online with other pro paintball shooters, get all geared up for the best battle arena action sports game of 2018.

Enjoy 3 amazing modes of gameplay:

-Free For All:
Score the highest points in a survival match and win the grand paint ball battle online.

-Team Death Match:
Make up teams of your own with your friends and fellows and fight the TDM in the field of paintball battle.

-Capture The Flag:
Reach the enemy base and capture the flag to bring it back as a winner.


Game Features:
• Extremely Smooth Controls
• 3D Graphics And Interesting Gameplay
• 3 Modes Of Online Multiplayer Game
• Create Customized Matches According To Your Preferences
• Share Links With Players To Join The Room To Fight The Same Match
• Play Online With Friends In Teams (TDM)
